00042 
00043 const string DEIprocess::modname = "DEI process";
00044 
00050 DEIprocess::
00051 DEIprocess(float _Gm, float _Gp, float _Rm, float _Rp)
00052   : Gm(_Gm), Gp(_Gp), Rm(_Rm), Rp(_Rp) {
00053   if ( Rm <=0 || Rm >= 1 )
00054         throw_error( modname, "The reflectivity in minus point"
00055                                  " is outside the range [0, 1.0].");
00056   if ( Rp <=0 || Rp >= 1 )
00057         throw_error( modname, "The reflectivity in plus point"
00058                                  " is outside the range [0, 1.0].");
00059   if (Gm<=0.0)
00060         throw_error( modname, "The derivative of reflectivity in minus point"
00061                                  " is less or equal to 0.");
00062   if (Gp>=0.0)
00063         throw_error( modname, "The derivative of reflectivity in plus point"
00064                                  " is greater or equal to 0.");
00065 }
00066 
00067 
00068 
00081 float
00082 DEIprocess::extract ( float minus, float plus, Component comp) const {
00083   static const float div = Rm*Gp - Rp*Gm;
00084   minus *= Rm;
00085   plus  *= Rp;
00086   if   ( minus == 0.0 && plus == 0.0 )
00087     return 0.0;
00088   return (comp == ABS) ?
00089     (minus*Gp - plus*Gm) / div :
00090     ( minus*Rp - plus*Rm ) / (plus*Gm - minus*Gp) ;
00091 }
00092 
00093 const std::string DEIprocess::componentDesc = 
00094   "Must be one of the following strings (case insensitive):\n"
00095   "A, ABS, ABSORPTION - for the absorption component\n"
00096   "R, REF, REFRACTION - for the refraction component";
